sentence.Network_en: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

sentence.Network_en: Johnson stared goggle-eyed at Kravis' sumptuous quarters.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰逊目瞪口呆地望着克拉维斯的豪宅。
我们在富丽堂皇的环境中用餐。

list.abs: 牙祭yá jì [sumptuous food] 丰盛的饭食牙具yá jù [tooth set] 刷牙漱口的用具牙口yá kǒu [age of a draught animal as shown by the number.
I was admitted by a gorgeous flunkey , and shown into a sumptuous room a couple of elderly gentlemen were sitting .一个衣着华丽的仆人把我接了进去，领到一个豪华房间，里头坐着两位上了岁数的绅士。
impeccable 非常棒的sumptuous boutique 豪华精品店breathtaking sight 壮观的景观
to me , just come home from work happily , the husband prepares the sumptuous dinner , , say to oneself : " Wife , you have come back . "对于我，幸福就是下班回家，老公准备了丰盛的晚餐，，对自己说：“老婆，你回来了。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'made or produced at great cost'): from Old French somptueux, from Latin sumptuosus, from sumptus 'expenditure' (see sumptuary)

entry.def: Something that is sumptuous is grand and obviously very expensive.

example.ex: She produces elegant wedding gowns in a variety of sumptuous fabrics.
example.tran: 她用各种华贵的布料制作高雅的婚纱。

stems_affixes.word_buile: sumpt拿,取+uous多……的→[把钱]拿出去→奢侈的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假定,设想;采取;承担;推测;假装
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强动作+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→拿住→认为是……[假定]
con共同+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→全拿完→消耗
pre预先+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→预先拿→假定

sentences.en: The guests turned up dressed in sumptuous evening gowns.
sentences.cn: 客人们身着华丽的夜礼服出现了。
